original_text: We demolish arguments and every pretension that sets itself up against the knowledge of God, and we take captive every thought to make it obedient to Christ.
korean_text: 하나님 아는 것을 대적하여 높아진 것을 다 무너뜨리고 모든 생각을 사로잡아 그리스도에게 복종하게 하니

sentences.original_text: that sets itself up against the knowledge of God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 지식을 대항하여 스스로 세우는 것을

sentences.original_text: and we take captive every thought
to make it obedient to Christ
